title: 1975년 Vines 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Vines. 판결일: 1975-09-29. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Herbert B. Vines v. Abraham Wollman, and Richard Rose
**판결일**: 1975-09-29
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 49 A.D.2d 771

## 판결문 요약


In a negligence action to recover damages for personal injuries, etc., plaintiffs appeal from an order of the Supreme Court, Rockland County, dated September 13, 1973, which denied their motion to vacate a prior order of the same court, entered April 25, 1973, dismissing the action. Order affirmed, with $20 costs and disbursements. Special Term was correct in disposing of the motion in the manner set forth in the order appealed from. Hopkins, Acting P. J., Latham, Margett, Brennan and Shapiro, JJ., concur.
...
